name: WKAudioFilePlayer
desc: An object that controls playback of a single audio item.  DeprecatedUse the AVFoundation framework’s AVPlayer and AVQueuePlayer classes instead.

items.name: init(playerItem: WKAudioFilePlayerItem)
items.desc: Creates and returns a player initialized with the specified player item.

items.name: func replaceCurrentItem(with: WKAudioFilePlayerItem?)
items.desc: Replaces the current player item with a different one.

items.name: func play()
items.desc: Begins playback of the current item.

items.name: func pause()
items.desc: Pauses playback of the associated item.

items.name: var error: Error?
items.desc: An error that describes the cause of a failure.

items.name: var currentTime: TimeInterval
items.desc: The elapsed time for the current playing item.

items.name: enum WKAudioFilePlayerStatus
items.desc: Constants that represent the status of the player.
